publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5784 Fergus Ewing: The Business Improvement Districts (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Business Improvement Districts (Scotland) Regulations 2007 (SSI 2007/202).

S2M-5784 Fergus Ewing: The Business Improvement Districts (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Business Improvement Districts (Scotland) Regulations 2007 (SSI 2007/202).
